text: László Paskai, O.F.M. (8 May 1927 – 17 August 2015)Elhunyt Paskai László bíboros - Archdiocese of Esztergom-Budapest, 2015.08.17. was a Hungarian cardinal of the Roman Catholic Church. He served as the archbishop of Esztergom-Budapest from 1987 to 2002. He was one of the cardinal electors who participated in the 2005 papal conclave that elected Pope Benedict XVI. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1927 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church Category:Hungarian Roman Catholic archbishops
title: László Paskai
